CustomField.description: Stores the benefit types passed by the associated HI application record.
CustomField.formula: TRIM( IF(Medical_Renewal__c, "Medical, ", "") & IF(Dental_Renewal__c, "Dental, ", "") & IF(Vision_Renewal__c, "Vision, ", "") & IF(Life_Renewal__c, "Life, ", "") & IF(Long_Term_Disability_Renewal__c, "LTD, ", "") & IF(Short_Term_Disability_Renewal__c, "STD, ", "") & IF(FSA_Renewal__c, "FSA, ", "") & IF(DCA_Renewal__c, "DCA, ", "") & IF(HSA_Renewal__c, "HSA, ", "") )
CustomField.label: Benefit Types
